payload.query: Diagnose and fix 404 errors on Proxmox MCP server endpoints. Investigate connectivity issues, verify service deployment in Kubernetes cluster (cortex-system namespace), check service routing and ingress configuration. Ensure all Proxmox API endpoints are accessible and responding correctly. Test endpoints: /list_nodes, /list_vms, /get_vm_status, /get_cluster_resources.
payload.title: PHASE 1.1: Fix and Stabilize Core Infrastructure - API Endpoint Diagnostics

result.answer: Good news! The Proxmox query tool is working, which means the backend Proxmox API is accessible. However, we need to check if the HTTP endpoints are working properly. Let me check the ConfigMap for the HTTP wrapper to understand the endpoint structure:
